name: Jagged Alliance: Flashback
blurb: The Godfather of turn-based RPG action is making its comeback! Mercenaries, guns and sarcastic humor galore!

rewards.reward: No Reward

Pea Shooter Tier: By supporting you\u2019re actively helping to bring back Jagged Alliance, thank you! ==============================\r\n\r\nSupporter badge for the official JAF forum + You will be added to the official website credit list

Support your Fellow Man Tier: You\u2019re doing the right thing, so you get:\r\n=============================\r\nThe Jagged Alliance Classics Pack (Also included in the $5 Tier and up) + Official digital sound track (ONLY THIS TIER) + Get half price off the game once released

Groin Attack Tier - ALL DIGITAL: Ouch! That hurts, but you\u2019re still rewarded with: ==============================\r\nDigital download of PC, Mac OSX or Linux DRM-free + Backer forum badge for the official JAF forum + You will be added to the official website credit list

Gunnam style Tier - ALL DIGITAL: Nothing like a gun to make you dance! You're rewarded with:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Digital high quality map of the game world + Digital copy of the Official Soundtrack

$42 Ahh You\u2019re That Guy Tier: I thought I recognized you, therefore you get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Get your name in the NPC name pool and write a simple short response. Every time you start a new game the names will be re-shuffled, so you have a chance to encounter your own NPC in the game.

Got a Bigger Gun Tier - ALL DIGITAL: Bigger is always better so you get: ==============================\r\n\r\nAll previous rewards + Digital high quality map of the game world + Digital copy of the Official Soundtrack + A digital copy of Jagged Alliance and Jagged Alliance 2 (English)

It's Time to Reload Tier: Get dem Bullets out! If you make it in time, you get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Digital high quality map of the game world + Digital copy of the Official Soundtrack + Early Access to the game + A Digital Documentary of the making of JA: Flashback

You\u2019re on my List Tier: That\u2019s why you\u2019re in the game:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Get your name in the Enemy name pool. Every time you start a new game the names will be re-shuffled, so you have a chance to encounter yourself on the battlefield. (If you go for the $85, $220 or $400 Tier, your response will be connected to the enemy name)

Low on Ammo Tier: There's always the melee option, there you get:\r\n=============================\r\nA boxed version of the game with a printed manual (ONLY THIS TIER) + Digital soundtrack + Digital map + Backer forum badge for the official JAF forum (Shipping is covered for the EU and the US but please add $25 if outside those areas )

Boom, Headshot! Tier - ALL DIGITAL: You must be out of your mind, but you’ll get: =============================

All previous rewards + Digital tactics manual
- Digital Jagged Alliance: Flashback art book + Access to the Beta version of the game + An exclusive in-game vanity item + Special backer forum badge for the official JAF forum
Umpa Bazooka Tier - ALL DIGITAL: That's a mind blower. You're rewarded with:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Get to write an enemy response (ONLY THIS TIER)

Van-Damn Good Tier: Yes you are, and that\u2019s why we reward you with: =============================\r\n\r\nAll previous rewards + Behind the scenes access to developer forum + The exclusive Backer t-shirt  (PHYSICAL)+ Your name in the \u2018special thank you!\u2019 credits roll

All Glory, No Brains Tier: FOR GLORY!, you get: =============================\r\n\r\nAll previous rewards + Get a mercenary quote in the game - lots of mercenaries in the game means lots of quotes needed (ONLY THIS TIER)

Kidney Puncher Tier: You hit em where it hurts, so you get: =============================\r\n\r\nAll previous rewards + Boxed collector\u2019s Edition (PHYSICAL) + Collector forum badge for the official JAF forum
$200 Who be the fool Tier: Surely not you, so you get: \r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + you get to make a name for the enemy name pool (ONLY THIS TIER)

Aim for the eyes Tier: Yeah, that should do the trick, so you get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + You get to choose to either write an enemy response or a mercenary one-liner (ONLY THIS TIER)

You\u2019re Cocking it Wrong Tier: That\u2019s what she said, but you\u2019re still getting: =============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Boxed Collectors Edition signed by the Development team (PHYSICAL) + Signed movie sized frameable poster (PHYSICAL) + Paperback copy of the the Jagged Alliance: Flashback art book (PHYSICAL - ONLY THIS TIER) + Access to the Alpha version of the game

$400 Tier: It\u2019s all in the bag Tier: So bring it home and enjoy the rewards, you\u2019ll get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + A mercenary one-liner + An enemy response + You get to make a name for the enemy name pool + You get to write a NPC Quote. (ALL ONLY THIS TIER)

Bobby Trapped Tier: The man sure drives a hard bargain and therefore you get: =============================\r\n\r\nAll previous rewards + Name a trash item in the game and co-write the item description (ONLY THIS TIER) + Signed Hardback copy of the Jagged Alliance: Flashback art book (PHYSICAL) + High quality Printed cloth map of the game world (PHYSICAL) + Your name on the wall of fame inside the game + First expansion pack for free

Woody Woodpecker Tier: You just can\u2019t enough of all that wood, so you get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous DIGITAL REWARDS + Become a manic woodcutter (Help co-design the woodcutter + co-write 3 responses)

Time to Party Tier: So get your guns out and lets go, you get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous DIGITAL REWARDS + Become a Bartender (Help co-design the bartender and the name of the bar + co-write 3 responses)

Running low on Fuel Tier: Maybe you should find a gas station then, you get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous DIGITAL REWARDS + Become a Gas Station Manager (Help co-design the gas station manager and the name of the gas station + co-write 3 responses)

Gunneck Rampage Tier: Howdy, I got a bullet with your name on it, but you still get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous DIGITAL REWARDS + Become an arms dealer (Help co-design the arms dealer and the name of the shop + co-write 3 responses)

Doctor Y No Q Tier: Phew, we\u2019re glad you\u2019re here, you\u2019re rewarded with:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous DIGITAL REWARDS + Become a Doctor (Help co-design the Doctor and the name of the clinic co-write 3 responses)

Turn-based Lover Tier: You sure love taking turns, but we like your style, so we reward you with: =============================\r\n\r\nAll previous rewards + Satchel pack with goodies and logo (PHYSICAL- Metal keyring (Jagged Alliance logo), beer coasters and stickers) + Unique high quality printed concept art piece signed by the Art director (PHYSICAL) + Personalized voice mail and ringtone performed by a Jagged Alliance cast member + Personal thank you note from the development team (PHYSICAL) + 2 extra digital copies of the game.

ICE CREAM *Ring Ring* Tier: Get your money out and treat the kids to an ice cream, for that we reward you with:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + You\u2019ll have your very own Ice Cream shop in the game and have the Shop NPC named after you and you get to choose the name of the shop. (Co-write 5 responses of your choice)

$850 Tier: The magnificent Tier: There can only be one, so you\u2019re rewarded with:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + A statue of you or your likeness in the game, with a description (ONLY THIS TIER)

$850 Slim Shady Business Tier: You got some sweet rhymes, so you get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Become the weapon smuggler in the game and have him named after you. (Co-write 5 responses of your choice)

Bubba Croc Tier: *Snap Snap* it\u2019s a Trap, you get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Become the croc \u201cfarmer\u201d in the game and help decide his name and the name of the croc farm. (Co-write 5 responses of your choice)

Going Gun Nuts  Tier: Guns, Guns, Guns, you just can\u2019t get enough of them and neither can we. You get: =============================\r\n\r\nAll previous rewards + Become an NPC within the game, we will use your name and (if relevant) use a picture of you to add a general likeness, in addition you will be added to the special NPC credits list. (ONLY this tier) + VIP forum badge for the official JAF forum + Personal thank you call from the development team + Numbered Jagged Alliance dog tag, each holds a code to a special unlock in the game (PHYSICAL) + Exclusive Manilla goodie envelope (PHYSICAL - Development pictures, concept art and frameable certificate of support signed by development team + 5 extra digital copies of the game

$1200 So You\u2019re a Bad Guy Tier: For the right price you may just play along, so you get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Help co-design an enemy in the game, who can be recruited to your team if persuaded in the right way. (Appearance, Nationality, Gender, Name) (ONLY THIS TIER)

$1500 You\u2019re breaking up Tier: We can't hear you, but you still get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Co-design the implementation of radio coverage on the island of San Christobal (ONLY THIS TIER) + Become the radio NPC guy (ONLY THIS TIER)
$1800 Get out your guns Tier: It's time to come out and play! You get: \r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Co-design a Mercenary in the game (ONLY THIS TIER)

Guns r Us Tier: We sure have some great  toys for you to play with, so you get: =============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Become a faction leader, we will use your name and (if relevant) use a picture of you to add a general likeness, in addition you will be added to the special NPC credits list. (ONLY THIS TIER) + Free access to all expansions + 10 extra digital copies of the game.
Two Please Tier: You sure drive a hard bargain, therefore you get: \r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards ($2500 not included) + The $1200 and $1800 bundled up (ONLY THIS TIER)
Lead and Conquer Tier: You\u2019re quite the multitasker huh, you get:\r\n=============================All previous rewards + The $1800 and the $2500 bundled up (ONLY THIS TIER)

M.E.R.C.iless Killer Tier: You clearly have no soul, and we like that, so you get: =============================\r\n\r\nAll previous rewards + Become a Story NPC within the game and a location, we will use your name and (if relevant) use a picture of you to add a general likeness, in addition you will be added to the special NPC credits list. (ONLY THIS TIER) + Help co-write a story for a side mission + Every mercenary has a special line, get to write your own and we\u2019ll add it to the game + Name a skill in the game + Join our in-house wall of fame and receive an invitation to the official launch party (accommodation paid, transport not included) + Signed collectible 9 inch tall game character figurine (PHYSICAL) + 25 extra digital copies of the game

You\u2019re the Boss Tier: And that\u2019s why you\u2019re rewarded with:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Become a base commander, get your own base and help co-design both the base itself and the commander + co-write the dialogue/responses

A.I.M.ing to Win Tier: You\u2019re clearly a die-hard fan so of course we\u2019ll shower you with these awesome rewards: =============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Become the Top Pimp (Story NPC) of the island and run your very own brothel (ONLY THIS TIER) + Have a in-game statue or monument made in your honor and to your likeness + Become an honorary member of the development team and be credited as such with a framed certificate and thank you picture (PHYSICAL) + A very special Thank you in the game credits + 50 extra digital copies of the game. + Top tier forum Badge for the official JAF forum + Gift bag of unique items + Meet and greet, enjoy a day with developers, before the day of the official launch party (which you\u2019re invited to as well (accommodation paid, transport not included))

$10000 Oily Business Tier: It\u2019s messy but you\u2019re swimming in black gold, you get:\r\n=============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Become the Oil Baron of the island (Story NPC) and have your very own small oasis with a deluxe Bedouin Tent, surrounded by oil fields (ONLY THIS TIER) + Have a in-game statue or monument made in your honor and to your likeness + Become an honorary member of the development team and be credited as such with a framed certificate and thank you picture (PHYSICAL) + A very special Thank you in the game credits + 50 extra digital copies of the game. + Top tier forum Badge for the official JAF forum + Gift bag of unique items + Meet and greet, enjoy a day with developers, before the day of the official launch party (which you\u2019re invited to as well (accommodation paid, transport not included))
